artist: Artist: Erick Lyle; Publisher: Erick Lyle , San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photographic image of a wall with several stenciled images, with text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 52 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, xerography; bound volume
title: SCAM, no. 6: In the Shadows of the Streets: The Stencil Art of the New Argentina
